about_the_game:
The Valheim Official Soundtrack features the original tracks from Valheim’s early access launch, as well as additional bonus tracks from the game’s release and cinematic trailers.

The soundtrack is an atmospheric journey through an imaginary Viking purgatory full of life, adventure and legends, with each track created to bring the game’s unique landscape and biomes to life.

From the mellow melodies of ‘Meadows’ to the almighty metal strings of “Boss 1 Eikthyr”or the howling winds of “Mountains”, Valheim OST will take you back in time to relive the adventures you’ve experienced with your friends, no matter where you are.

The soundtrack is an atmospheric journey through an imaginary Viking purgatory full of life, adventure and legends, with each track created to bring the game’s unique landscape and biomes to life.

From the mellow melodies of ‘Meadows’ to the almighty metal strings of “Boss 1 Eikthyr”or the howling winds of “Mountains”, Valheim OST will take you back in time to relive the adventures you’ve experienced with your friends, no matter where you are.

Minimum:
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 149000 MB available space
